name: Lets Paint It - Hit the Tower
name_original: Lets Paint It - Hit the Tower
description:
If you are looking for an exciting game so you are in the right one. Download and play this best paint game. You wanna paint over the rotating rings to build a beautiful colored tower. Paint a tower with the paint ball is a free game in addicting games and challenging games.

There is a painted ball which you have to throw with tap but the paintball should hit on unpainted space to paint hot the tower.

Features of Splash Paint to Hit Game:
• One ball tap and so easy to learn, rich visual effects and addictive game mechanics.
• Enjoy the beautiful art style and casual game-play.
• Great audio to help you get in the zone.
• Messy painting fun free games.
• You won't stop till you splat all the way to the top!
• Challenge the bosses. Can you master their quirks?
• Endless game-play with 100's of levels.
• Coloring Games - Enjoyable games for kids, girls, and elders.
